name: Steep and Slippery Upway We Go
description: Embarking on any journey that involves an uphill climb, up a steep and slippery surface. Keeping your eyes and mind focused upward, forward one step at a time. There will be slips back downward, but each fall is part of the experience. Sky isn't the limit. Push the clouds out of the way. The space beyond is infinitely expanding.   Original 3D design. 1080x1060 MP4 video.
